grants.title: MOVE fellowships
grants.call: One fellowship awarded at DSEV Annual Symposium
grants.body:
#### What we support

One-three months of research stays at a MOVE host lab in Europe.

#### Grant size

max. DKK 15.000

#### Eligibility

PhD students, postdocs, research technicians

#### How to apply

grants.title: Sandwich grants
grants.body:
#### What we support

Basic catering (sandwiches and refreshments) at local meetings.

#### Grant size

DSEV allocates a total budget of max. DKK 5.000 per semester

#### Eligibility

Local EV community
